He and Cody make eye contact as he enters the stall and he suspects that Cody is willing, so he taps on the hole, demanding Cody's cock, and after a short time deliberating, Cody obliges. Billy guides the cock through the hole and into his waiting mouth, as Cody emits a satisfied moan, low and rumbling. He fucks Billy's mouth like that for a while, before Billy comes out to meet face to face. Billy has his cock in his hand as he opens the door, and Cody licks his palm and begins to stroke in earnest as Billy does the same, losing his load in an unexpected spurt as Cody follows suit and blasts the floor with a load of his own, before both guys go their separate ways. Not sure who has to clean up the locker room but they're not going to be too happy. Enjoy!
title: The Hole Encounter
